compliance.report.note: Calculated from the Q2 2020 Compliance Instrument Report

burn.area.note: The exact burned area is moderately sensitive to the processing method. Under maximally conservative parameters, we found the burned area to remain at or above 64%. See our Jupyter Notebook for full details.

mortality.estimation.title: Based on an area-weighted average from Table 2 in a USFS Report on the fire and using common burn severities of 10% mortality in "Low Mortality", 10-75% mortality in "Mixed Mortality", and 75% mortality in "High Mortality" categories.
